Uses of Class
org.miktim.websocket.WsConnection

      Methods in org.miktim.websocket that return WsConnection 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WsConnection WebSocket.connect(String uri, WsConnection.Handler handler)
      Creates and starts WebSocket client connection with default parameters
      See: WebSocket.connect(String, WsConnection.Handler, WsParameters) for details
      WsConnection WebSocket.connect(String uri, WsConnection.Handler handler, WsParameters wsp)
      Creates and starts WebSocket client connection.
      WsConnection[] WebSocket.listConnections()
      Lists active client connections.
      WsConnection[] WsServer.listConnections()
      Lists serve-side connections.
      WsConnection WsConnection.ready()
      Waiting for the WebSocket handshake to complete.
      Methods in org.miktim.websocket with parameters of type WsConnection 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void WsConnection.Handler.onClose(WsConnection conn, WsStatus status)
      Called when the WebSocket connection closed.
      void WsConnection.Handler.onError(WsConnection conn, Throwable err)
      Called when the WebSocket connection error occurs.

      Called when a WebSocket message is received.
      void WsConnection.Handler.onOpen(WsConnection conn, String subProtocol)
      Called when opening a WebSocket connection.
